#### Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(ggpubr)
```

#### Data

```{r, include = FALSE}
dust<- read_csv(here("data", "processed_data", "dust", "dust_master.csv"))
data<- read_csv(here("data", "processed_data", "tx_master.csv"))
```

# Clean

#### Select and Filter

```{r}
data<-
  data %>%
  filter(Type %in% "Daily",
         hr_cst %in% "01") %>%
  select(copies_mL, cfu_tot, site, date)
```

# Plot

#### CFU

```{r}
cfu<-
  data %>%
  ggplot() + 
  geom_line(
    aes(x = date,
        y = cfu_tot,
        color = site)) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("Blind Oso" = "#809C52",
                                "Canals" = "#ba4716",
                                "Gulf" = "4c848c")) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = "Date",
       y = "CFU/mL")+
  theme(axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        axis.text.x = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "none")
```

#### Total Vibrio

```{r}
vib<-
  data %>%
  ggplot() + 
  geom_line(
    aes(x = date,
        y = copies_mL,
        color = site)) +
 #facet_wrap(~site)+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("Blind Oso" = "#809C52",
                                "Canals" = "#ba4716",
                                "Gulf" = "4c848c")) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(y = "Total Vibrio copies/mL")+
  theme(axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        axis.text.x = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "none")
```

#### Dust

```{r}
d<- 
  dust %>%
  filter(between(date, as.Date('2022-07-07'),  as.Date('2022-07-19'))) %>%
  ggplot()+ geom_line(
    aes(x = date,
        y = t7sum)) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = "Date",
       y = "Dust AOD")
```

#### Combine

```{r}
master_fig<-
  ggarrange(cfu,vib,d,
            nrow = 3,
            ncol = 1,
            align = "v")

master_fig

ggsave(here("results", "plots", "dust_cfu_total.png" ))
```
